name: Everpixel Tactics Demo
description:
Everpixel Tactics is what happens when you combine tactical RPG, mercenaries, dinosaurs, and wiener dogs. Lead your motley crew of mercenaries to pixelated dominance in a dynamic, procedurally-generated world.

Features:

  • Brutal, tactical RPG combat
  • Squad management
  • Deep, unrestricted character builds
  • Magic
  • Tons of pixelated loot
  • Fantasy clichés turned up to 11
  • Alcoholic necromancers
  • Wiener dogs the size of horses
  • ...and more...
